name: Problem Trolley
description:
Playable now for Playdate!

You control Railway Ralph, who needs to decide where to route the trolley, but this means sometimes choosing the lesser of two evils...

There are a suspicious amount of people tragically tied up on the trolley tracks (I'm guessing they got into debt with the wrong people.).  Use the Playdate's crank to switch between the two tracks to spare as many lives as possible!

Art & game design by Neil Austin

Programming by Andrew Loebach
